title: Stanley Baxter: Scottish comedian with a gift for sketches, mimicry and song
subtitle: The actor and impressionist, known for comic parodies and his love of dressing up, was one of the biggest stars of the 1970s and 1980s.
full_text: The actor and impressionist, known for comic parodies and his love of dressing up, was one of the biggest stars of the 1970s and 1980s.
